Seal characters (1)

憮字的基本解释

憮
wǔ
见“怃”。

憮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǔ］
［《廣韻》文甫切，上麌，微。］
“怃1”的繁体字。
(1)怅然失意貌。
(2)惊愕貌。参见“憮然”。
(3)哀怜。
(4)同，兼。《汉书·薛宣传》：“故或以德顯，或以功舉，君子之道，焉可憮也！”颜师古注引苏林曰：“憮，同也，兼也。”一说通“誣”。宋王观国《学林·怃幠》：“以憮有空義，可以借與'誣'字通用。”
(5)通“嫵”。媚好貌。
[②]［hū］
［《集韻》荒胡切，平模，曉。］
“怃2”的繁体字。
(1)傲慢。参见“憮2敖”。
(2)通“幠”。大；粗。

憮字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憮； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页404第01
【集韻】【韻會】?罔甫切，音武。【說文】愛也。从心無聲。【爾雅·釋言】撫也。【註】愛撫也。【疏】《方言》東齊邠陶之閒謂愛曰憮。　又【廣韻】憮然，失意貌。【三蒼】怪愕之辭。【論語】夫子憮然。【何晏註】爲其不達己意，而便非己也。【廣韻】或作㒇。　又【五音集韻】况羽切。【前漢·張敞傳】京兆眉憮。【註】憮，音詡。孟康曰：北方人以媚好爲詡。一曰傲也。　又【集韻】荒乎切，音呼。大也。【詩·小雅】亂如此憮，叶上辜。【註】火吳反。【毛傳】憮，大也。　又傲也。【禮·投壺】毋憮毋傲。　又【集韻】【韻會】?微夫切，音無。【廣韻】空也。

小篆楷体

disappointed
Basic explanation of words
disappointed
wǔ

disappointed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wǔ］
["Guangyun" Wen Fuqie, Shangzhe, Wei. ]
"怃1" in traditional characters.
(1) Feeling disappointed.
(2) Appearance in astonishment. See "Painted".
(3) Pity.
(4) Same and concurrent. "Han Shu·Xue Propaganda": "Therefore, either by virtue or meritorious deeds, the way of a gentleman, you can be ashamed!" Yan Shigu quoted Su Lin and said: "Yan, the same, and both." Say "falsely". Song Wang Guanguo's "Xuelin·Yuyu": "Yiyi has empty meaning, and it can be borrowed and used in common with the word'false'."
(5) Through "Wu". Mei looks good.
[②]［hū］
["Ji Yun" Barren Hu cut, flat model, Xiao. ]
"怃2" in traditional characters.
(1) Arrogance. See "Yang 2 Ao".
(2) Through "幠". Big; rough.
disappointed

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　怃; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 404 01
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Do not cut, sound Wu. [Said Wen] Love also. Silent from the heart. [Erya·Interpretation] Fu Ye. [Note] Caress also. [Sparse] "Dialect" in the Eastern Qi Dynasty, Hun Tao's leisure called love and sorrow.　[Guang Yun] Random, disappointed appearance. [Sancang] Strange speech. [The Analects] The Master was shocked. [He Yan's Note] For it is not up to one's own will, but not one's own. [Guang Yun] Or make 㒇.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Kuang Yuqie. [Previous Han · Zhang Chang's Biography] Jing Zhaomei was troubled. 【Note】Yan, Yin Xu. Meng Kang said: Northerners take the charm of good fortune. One said proudly.　[Jiyun] It’s ridiculous, and the sound is called. Big too. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Ye Shanggu is so confused. [Note] Huo Wu anti. [Mao Chuan] Shocked, great.　Also proud. 【Rite·Throwing Pot】Won't be surprised or arrogant.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Weifuqie, no sound. [Guang Yun] Empty too.
